[Continue to review full report at Codecov](https://codecov.io/gh/willmcgugan/rich/pull/369?src=pr&el=continue).
> **Legend** - [Click here to learn more](https://docs.codecov.io/docs/codecov-delta)
> `Δ = absolute <relative> (impact)`, `ø = not affected`, `? = missing data`
> Powered by [Codecov](https://codecov.io/gh/willmcgugan/rich/pull/369?src=pr&el=footer). Last update [e75649a...efb3008](https://codecov.io/gh/willmcgugan/rich/pull/369?src=pr&el=lastupdated). Read the [comment docs](https://docs.codecov.io/docs/pull-request-comments).

Great work.

I'm a little concerned that adding 6 more regexes may start to have an impact on performance. Regexes are pretty fast, but the highlighter will loop through each one. 

I think it might be possible to combine some of those regexes so we have fewer to loop through. Would you mind looking at that?

Would you like me to combine them into one with a big OR `|` join, or would it be okay to combine in a way that sacrifices correctness, e.g.:
Combining
* `([0-9A-Fa-f]{1,2}-){5}[0-9A-Fa-f]{1,2}`
* `([0-9A-Fa-f]{1,2}:){5}[0-9A-Fa-f]{1,2}`

Into
* `([0-9A-Fa-f]{1,2}[-:]){5}[0-9A-Fa-f]{1,2}`

Will erroneously allow mixed colons and hyphens
* `01-23:45-67:89-AB`

or combining
* `([0-9A-Fa-f]{1,2}-){5}[0-9A-Fa-f]{1,2}`
* `([0-9A-Fa-f]{1,2}-){7}[0-9A-Fa-f]{1,2}`

Into
* `([0-9A-Fa-f]{1,2}-){5,7}[0-9A-Fa-f]{1,2}`

Will erroneously allow a non-standard length (7 groups of two)
* `01-23-45-67-89-AB-CD`
